trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_SEQ_00<tab>Mogmont is flapping his tired wings vigilantly.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_SEQ_01<tab>Constant conflicts between the dragons of the north and south are taking their toll on Mogmont's health. Slay three of each to give him time for much-needed rest.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the moss dragons and lower skylords. Report back to Mogmont with the good news.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_SEQ_03<tab>Behind Mogmont's tired eyes you see a well of gratitude. The moogles must ensure that the servants of Nidhogg do not lay waste to Hraesvelgr's sacred domain.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_MOGMONT_000_000<tab>The skylords of the north and south are in constant conflict. That is why one must remain ever vigilant, always on alert... I'm at my wit's end, kupo!

TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_MOGMONT_000_001<tab>The moogles here are in desperate need of relief. If you were to put a pause to the dragons' fighting by slaying a few, it's like to give us some breathing room, kupo.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_MOGMONT_000_010<tab>It's impossible to be on guard all day every day─slay the dragons before we collapse from exhaustion.
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_MOGMONT_000_020<tab>Ah... Now we can finally breathe without dragons bothering us! It might be time to break out the wine, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNZ409_01827_MOGMONT_000_021<tab>Asah is the domain of Hraesvelgr, and we can't permit Nidhogg's menacing minions to encroach upon it. May you aid us again in our time of need!
